about_the_game:
Lovely Anime Puzzle: Patrick is a delightful puzzle game featuring charming anime-style girls in festive St. Patrick Day attire.

Your goal is to assemble images of these adorable characters, which have been divided into a set number of puzzle pieces.

The game offers 4 difficulty levels that progressively increase the challenge and add new excitement. Regardless of the chosen difficulty, you’ll enjoy high-quality artwork showcasing the vibrant holiday theme.

Key features of Lovely Anime Puzzle: Patrick:

• 50 engaging levels

• Beautiful Patrick-themed artwork

• Intuitive mouse controls

• Achievements to unlock

• Relaxing background music

content_descriptors.notes: This game features partial nudity (women in underwear) but does not include full nudity or explicit content. The game is missing: sexual abuse,sex, physical abuse,  sexual acts and extreme violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics, AMD Radeon Graphics, NVIDIA GeForce
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics, AMD Radeon Graphics, NVIDIA GeForce
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Lovely Anime Puzzle: Patrick is a fun and rewarding puzzle game. Assemble charming St.Patrick Day-themed pictures, sharpen your attention, and immerse yourself in a festive holiday world.
